title: Describing a Complex Project to a Non-Technical Person
description: You explain a technical or complex project you worked on to someone who doesn’t have a technical background. You’ll practice simplifying terms, structuring your answer clearly, and reacting to confusion or curiosity.

goals.phrase: Explain a project in simple terms
Avoid technical jargon or explain it clearly
Respond to questions or confusion politely
goals.translation: Вежливо реагировать на вопросы или непонимание

scenario.situation: User is asked to describe their past project or role to someone without a tech background
scenario.goal: Train the user to speak clearly and confidently about technical topics, while being understood by a non-specialist
steps: Greet the user and ask them to describe a project they've worked on recently.
Ask them to summarize what the project was and why it was important.
Ask follow-up questions to clarify the problem it solved and who used it.
Ask what the user’s role in the project was.
Encourage the user to explain how it worked in simple terms. Ask for clarification if needed.
React with mild confusion or curiosity to challenge their explanation in a friendly way.
Ask about the outcome or impact of the project.
Wrap up the conversation and thank the user for sharing.

prompt: You are someone curious but not technical. Ask the user to describe one of their recent projects. Ask follow-up questions if something is unclear. Be polite, curious, and maybe a little confused at times.

dictionary.meaning: the part of the software that users interact with
a computer that provides services or data to other computers
to make a process work by itself with little human input
a part of a product that performs a specific task
a flaw that causes something to work incorrectly

phrases.phrase: It was basically a tool to help users manage their data more easily.
phrases.translation: Это по сути был инструмент, помогающий пользователям легче управлять данными.

phrases.phrase: My job was to make sure everything worked smoothly on the backend.
phrases.translation: Моя задача была — обеспечить стабильную работу на стороне сервера.

phrases.phrase: Imagine a digital assistant that organizes your tasks — it was a bit like that.
phrases.translation: Представь цифрового помощника, который организует твои задачи — было что-то вроде этого.

phrases.phrase: Sorry, that was a bit technical — I mean it just made things faster.
phrases.translation: Извини, это прозвучало слишком по-технически — я имею в виду, это просто ускоряло процесс.

meta.end_behavior: That sounds cool! I didn’t get all of it, but it seems like a big deal.
